name: Chuck Yeager's Advanced Flight Trainer 2.0
storyline: Every pilot's dream: to watch a flight from every possible angle... while flying slot with the Thunderbirds.
summary: Chuck Yeager's Advanced Flight Trainer 2.0 is a flight simulator game. Follow Yeager's cursor, instrument settings and instructions on a couple of landings and you'll set her down right every time. Hug the ground at 50 feet, pull 8 G's around the pylon and streak full-throttle for home. Screaming toward earth at supersonic speed, you're a breath away from drilling a hole. In test piloting, the real hero is the one who survives.
